name: Ricochet (itch) (Tjakka5)
description:
Ricochet:
Step into shoes of a professional assassin on a mission to get a secure kill on his targets.
Equipped with a rifle and a trick up his sleeves; Something about bullets ricocheting off of walls. However. This is just a rumor. Nobody alive has been able to report it.

Controls:
A and D / Arrow keys to move.
Left mouse button to shoot.
Mouse to aim.

Credits:
Tjakka5: Programmer & Artists ( http://tjakka5.sorunome.de/portfolio/ )
&I: Composer & Sound Designer ( https://www.youtube.com/user/TheOfficalAndI )

Made in 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam ( Theme: Only one )
